channel.title: Corruptionx Source / Combat Problem! Any solutions for this?
channel.description:
Guys I downloaded Corruptionx Source because it was based on the Caleum source. So my problem is that I cant attack any NPC. I know this is an error on the source its self but how can I fix this? Many other people have this problem too and the problem is only in this source. :|
The orginial corruptionx server its self has fixed this issue! :( Guys I want this source this source very badly so dont tell me to change the source. Because this is the only source that I could find thats based on the caleum source and other sources suck. So please help :D
